column5: of paris passed away saturday june 13
column6: 2015 in paris regional medical center. she was born on july 5
column7: 1950 in paris a daughter of albert and myrtle marie carson morgan. she married jimmie c. barnes on october 24
column9: texas. she was a longtime sales clerk at walmart. survivors include her husband jimmie c. barnes
column11: grandchild raistlin l. barnes and a sister joyce barnes. graveside services will be conducted at 10:00 a. m. wednesday in meadowbrook gardens cemetery.
